long.am,ar,bn,ca,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,fa,gu,h:
GeoStormis a powerful and convenient Chrome extension designed to provide up-to-date information about magnetic storms and other geomagnetic events.

Powered by verified and accurate data from the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), StormAlert will be your trusted source of information on geomagnetic conditions.

1.2.0 - fix forecast diagramm colors
long.bg,cs,da,de,el,es,es_419,et,fi,fil,fr,hi:
StormAlert is a powerful and convenient Chrome extension designed to provide up-to-date information about magnetic storms and other geomagnetic events. Powered by verified and accurate data from the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), StormAlert will be your trusted source of information on geomagnetic conditions.

Key Features:

Up-to-date Notifications: Receive timely notifications of magnetic storms and geomagnetic events directly to your desktop.
Real-Time Data: Integration with NOAA provides access to the latest information on magnetic storms and solar activity.
Personalised Settings: Customise notifications according to your preferences by selecting the levels of magnetic storms you want to be notified about.
Detailed Information: View detailed reports on magnetic storms, including timelines, intensity and potential impact on different regions.
Interactive Maps: Use interactive maps to visualise current and upcoming geomagnetic events.
